Name: French 77
Instructions: POUR first 2 ingredients into chilled glass, and TOP with sparkling wine.
Review: Elderflower liqueur adds flavour to dry sparkling wine while a splash of lemon juice helps balance the rich liqueur.
History: A floral riff on the classic French 75 created in 2006 by yours truly. French 75 cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of French 77 contains 144 calories
